meanings.sent1: The trachytic rock had a rough texture.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was covered in trachytic boulders.
meanings.sent3: The trachytic stone looked like a giant sponge!
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as trachytic as the hardened lava.
meanings.sent5: The trachytic surface sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: The trachytic layers formed a sturdy foundation.
meanings.sent2: The trachytic composition of the soil made it fertile.
meanings.sent3: The trachytic mixture bubbled like a boiling pot.
meanings.sent4: His words were as solid and trachytic as the rock itself.
meanings.sent5: The trachytic content gave the structure its strength.
